label_merge_first_message.text:
On the next screen, select all of the Time Stamper
output files whose notes you would like to merge.
You can select one file OR you can select multiple
files using ctrl+click (or command+click on Macs).

Close this window to proceed.

label_merge_second_message.text:
Next, select the file where the merged notes
should be saved to (just a single file this time).
This should be a ".txt" file.

Close this window to proceed.

label_merge_failure_repeated_file.text:
MERGE FAILED

You cannot save merged notes to a file
whose notes are already a part of the merge.
Please try again.

Close this window to proceed.
